page.title: 07People in the area
page.content: Ninety eight people live in our area of which six are under five,ten are primary school age,ten are aged between eleven and eighteen,sixty two are eighteen to sixty and twenty are retired. The area has seventeen farmers,three forestry workers,two teachers,an estate agent,a builder,water official,professor,two engineers,one unemployed,an army cadet,a doctors receptionist,a vet,a swimming teacher,a mechanic and one on the Youth Training Scheme. All the farmers,forestry workers,one teacher,the builder and the water official work in the valley. The doctors receptionist,the vet and the swimming teacher work in the nearest village.
